item.title: Save $40 on a Handmade Dutch Coffeemaker That's Built for Life
item.description: Handmade in the Netherlands, the Moccamaster will kickstart your morning for years to come.

item.title: WIRED Roundup: How Charlie Kirk Changed Conservative Media
item.description: On this episode of "Uncanny Valley," we discuss the legacy of Charlie Kirk and the aftermath of his murder.

item.title: Apple MacOS Tahoe 26: Top New Features to Try Today
item.description: MacOS Tahoe 26 brings a slew of new features, from a dedicated Games app to a revamped Spotlight function. You can now try them out for yourself.

item.title: The Top New Features in Apple WatchOS 26
item.description: Apple’s new additions this year include a wrist-flick gesture to dismiss a call and a personalized Workout Buddy to tell you when you “crushed it.”

item.title: Turn Your Old Tech Into Art—Now With a 20% Discount
